statements: SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE stock_symbol='AAPL';
SELECT closing_price, volume FROM market_data WHERE date='2022-01-01';
SELECT date, closing_price FROM market_data WHERE volume > 1000000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, volume, closing_price FROM market_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY volume DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE closing_price < 50 AND volume >= 500000 ORDER BY stock_symbol;
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE closing_price > 100 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT stock_symbol, AVG(closing_price) AS avg_price FROM market_data GROUP BY stock_symbol HAVING AVG(closing_price) > 50
SELECT MAX(closing_price) AS max_price, MIN(closing_price) AS min_price FROM market_data
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY volume DESC
SELECT stock_symbol, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM market_data GROUP BY stock_symbol HAVING COUNT(*) > 10
SELECT * FROM market_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, price FROM market_data WHERE volume > 1000;
SELECT * FROM risk_exposure WHERE exposure_level > 0.05 AND risk_factor BETWEEN 1 AND 10 ORDER BY symbol ASC;
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM market_data GROUP BY symbol;
SELECT id, symbol, timestamp FROM market_data WHERE symbol LIKE 'AAPL%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT symbol, price FROM market_data WHERE volume > 1000 ORDER BY symbol ASC;
SELECT symbol, exposure_level FROM risk_exposure WHERE risk_factor < 50 ORDER BY symbol DESC;
SELECT symbol, price, volume FROM market_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM market_data;
SELECT * FROM market_trends;
SELECT trend_id, trend_description FROM market_trends WHERE trend_date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT * FROM risk_exposure ORDER BY exposure_category ASC;
SELECT exposure_id, exposure_description, exposure_amount FROM risk_exposure WHERE exposure_amount > 1000;
SELECT data_id, data_type, data_value FROM market_data WHERE data_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE trend_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT trend_description, trend_date FROM market_trends WHERE trend_description LIKE '%up%' ORDER BY trend_description ASC;
SELECT data_type, data_value FROM market_data WHERE data_value > 1000 ORDER BY data_value DESC;
SELECT exposure_description, exposure_amount FROM risk_exposure WHERE exposure_category = 'High Risk' ORDER BY exposure_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE data_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM trends_in_market_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, market_sector FROM trends_in_market_data WHERE market_sector = 'Technology';
SELECT trend_description FROM trends_in_market_data WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM risk_exposure WHERE risk_score > 0.5 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT sector_name, performance_score FROM market_sectors INNER JOIN sector_performance ON market_sectors.id = sector_performance.sector_id;
SELECT * FROM trends_in_market_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT trend_description, market_sector FROM trends_in_market_data WHERE date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT sector_id, risk_score FROM risk_exposure WHERE risk_score >= 0.5 ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT sector_name, performance_score FROM market_sectors JOIN sector_performance ON market_sectors.id = sector_performance.sector_id WHERE performance_score < 0.7;
SELECT sector_id, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM risk_exposure GROUP BY sector_id HAVING num_records > 5 ORDER BY num_records DESC;
SELECT * FROM MarketData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT symbol, price FROM MarketData WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY symbol ASC;
SELECT symbol, trade_value FROM TradeHistory WHERE trade_volume > 5000 ORDER BY trade_value DESC;
SELECT symbol, exposure_amount, risk_level FROM RiskExposure WHERE risk_level = 'High';
SELECT symbol, trend_type, trend_description FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_type = 'Bullish' ORDER BY symbol DESC;
SELECT * FROM MarketData WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, trade_volume, trade_value FROM TradeHistory WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND trade_volume > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT symbol, trend_type, trend_description FROM MarketTrends WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY trend_type, timestamp DESC;
SELECT symbol, exposure_amount, risk_level FROM RiskExposure WHERE risk_level = 'High' ORDER BY exposure_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT symbol, risk_score, risk_comment FROM RiskAssessment WHERE risk_score >= 8.0 ORDER BY symbol, risk_score DESC;
